sourcesContent:
const formDataRadio = [
    {
        labelName: "Arcade",
        typeInput: "radio",
        valueMo: 9,
        valueYr: 90,
        id: "arcade",
        labelSpanMo: "$9/mo",
        labelSpanYr: "$90/yr",
        yearlySpan: '2 months free',
        spanClass: "text-[14px] font-normal text-grey",
        spanYearlyClass: 'text-[12px] text-denim font-normal leading-4',
        labelClass: "flex flex-col justify-end gap-[5px] text-[16px] text-denim font-medium w-[138px] h-[160px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey p-[16px] bg-arcade bg-no-repeat bg-[left_16px_top_20px] hover:border-purple cursor-pointer",
        labelClass:
          'flex flex-col justify-end gap-[5px] text-[16px] text-denim font-medium w-[138px] h-[183px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey p-[16px] bg-arcade bg-no-repeat bg-[left_16px_top_20px] hover:border-purple cursor-pointer',
    },
    {
        labelName: 'Arcade',
        typeInput: 'radio',
        value: 90,
        id: 'arcade',
        labelSpan: '$90/yr',
        spanClass: 'text-[14px] font-normal text-grey',
      },
    {
        labelName: "Advanced",
        typeInput: "radio",
        value: 12,
        id: "advanced",
        labelSpan: "$12/mo",
        spanClass: "text-[14px] font-normal text-grey",
        labelClass: "flex flex-col justify-end gap-[5px] text-[16px] text-denim font-medium w-[138px] h-[160px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey p-[16px] bg-advanced bg-no-repeat bg-[left_16px_top_20px] hover:border-purple cursor-pointer",
        },
    {
        labelName: "Pro",
        typeInput: "radio",
        value: 15,
        id: "pro",
        labelSpan: "$15/mo",
        spanClass: "text-[14px] font-normal text-grey",
        labelClass: "flex flex-col justify-end gap-[5px] text-[16px] text-denim font-medium w-[138px] h-[160px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey p-[16px] bg-pro bg-no-repeat bg-[left_16px_top_20px] hover:border-purple cursor-pointer",
    },
   
]

export default formDataRadio
